meanings.definition: Used to express surprise or excitement.
meanings.sent2: Oh golly, I can't believe it!
meanings.sent3: Golly, a talking dog? How peculiar!
meanings.sent4: The fireworks lit up the sky, golly, it was like magic!
meanings.sent5: When the magician pulled a rabbit out of the hat, golly, the audience gasped in amazement!

meanings.definition: An exclamation of mild surprise or wonder.
meanings.sent1: Wow, golly, that's a big cake!
meanings.sent2: Golly, look at the stars shining brightly!
meanings.sent3: Golly, a squirrel wearing sunglasses, how funny!
meanings.sent4: The rainbow stretched across the sky, golly, it was beautiful!
meanings.sent5: As the balloon floated higher and higher, golly, it seemed to touch the clouds!
